name: Aloner- A horror game without any jumpscares
name_original: Aloner- A horror game without any jumpscares
description:
Aloner takes place in an unknown location. You must discover what's been happening.

It's a horror game without any jumpscares. Completely relies on narrative , sound and puzzles.

[Story]

You accept your friend's challenge. After driving and heading inside, everything turns upside down. Unknown roams the place. Find the exit key and get out.

!INCLUDES A VERY F'D UP NARRATIVE BTW REALLY WEIRD AND SUCH.

!!LIKE IT INCLUDES CANNIBALISM SO NOT FOR EVERYONE OBVIOUSLY

!!!I MEAN I FELT WEIRD WHILE WRITING IT SO...

[Information]

Move:  W,A,S,D

Interact: E

Compatibility: For every computer with a keyboard that has the keys W,A,S,D and E

(except Linux)

[Developer's Note]

 After seeing my favorite youtuber scream at a jumpscare for the 2000000th time, i decided that , with a little effort, a horror game without any jumpscares can be made.

 Please note that this game was made for a jam under a short period of time and was made as an experiment. Thanks, have fun. Any feedback is accepted. 

Thanks to Mimpy.
